entry.summary: And for the nth time, I’m starting a new blog. It’s a bit sad that I keep making these and changing them, but perhaps that’s the nature of things?
entry.content:
And for the nth time, I’m starting a new blog. It’s a bit sad that I keep making these and changing them, but perhaps that’s the nature of things?

Nothing in this post. I’ll take it down later. For now, I need some place-holder content.
